db.title: Nhân viên bếp nướng
db.about: My name is Tran Thi Cam My, date of birth 10/08/1994, I am currently a student of University of Finance – Marketing , Major: Finance - Banking Had 3 months intern in Eximbank branch 4 and a member of RMIT Drama Club with Assistant Treasurer position from 2015-2016. I bring a deep rooted passion for baking with a strong desire to excel in the art. Over 2 years I have taught myself basic baking through videos and cooking books, I am well versed in general duties of the position along with state issued hygiene and sanitation principles. I am able to mix, prepare, bake and calculate ratios of ingredients to produce high quality cake and other baked items as per given instructions. I never had any professional experiences before but I asure with my high observation ability, I can learn very fast and become handy soon enough.
db.skill: Computer Exellent Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) – B Certificate Grade A (University of Science) Adobe Photoshop Basic Exellent Internet Searching Language English: Proficiency at four skills (TOEIC 600) Vietnamese: Native Team working, Leadership: 8/10 Work under pressure: 8/10 Communication, Interpersonal: 9/10 Analytical thinking, Problem-solving: 9/10 Planning, Time Management: 7/10
